author: Melissa Souza*
title: Minas tem 250 cidades sob alerta de grande perigo de chuva; veja quais - Estado de Minas
text: O Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia (Inmet) emitiu, na manh√£ desta sexta-feira (22/3), um alerta de risco para chuvas intensas em 250 cidades de Minas Gerais (veja lista abaixo), v√°lido at√© √†s 10h de domingo (24/3). De acordo com o Inmet, o volume pluviom√©trico deve ficar superior a 60mm por hora ou maior que 100mm por dia, com ventos superiores a 100km/h. Segundo a meteorologista Anete Fernandes, o ac√∫mulo de chuva previsto √© muito alto at√© mesmo dentro de 48 horas. ‚ÄúPegando uma cidade da Zona da Mata como exemplo, a m√©dia de chuva de Juiz de Fora para o m√™s de mar√ßo √© de 207,5 mm. Logo, se chover 100mm ou mais em 48 horas √© como se metade da chuva de refer√™ncia para todo o m√™s ocorresse em apenas dois dias‚Äù, exemplifica a meteorologista. Ainda de acordo com a especialista, as regi√µes mais afetadas s√£o a Zona da Mata e parte do sul de Minas, mas n√£o significa que todas as localidades ter√£o grande volume de chuva e, sim, que podem ocorrer em pontos isolados. A instabilidade do tempo ocorre em decorr√™ncia de uma frente fria que atinge o litoral paulista. H√°, ainda, grande risco de danos em edifica√ß√µes, corte de energia el√©trica, de queda de √°rvores, descargas el√©tricas, alagamentos, enxurradas e grandes transtornos no transporte rodovi√°rio. Recomenda√ß√µes - N√£o se abrigue debaixo de √°rvores, pois h√° risco de queda e descargas el√©tricas e n√£o estacione ve√≠culos pr√≥ximos a torres de transmiss√£o e placas de propaganda - Se poss√≠vel, desligue aparelhos el√©tricos e quadro geral de energia. - Obtenha mais informa√ß√µes junto √† Defesa Civil (telefone 199) e ao Corpo de Bombeiros (telefone 193). Confira as cidades com grande risco de chuva: Abre Campo Acaiaca Aiuruoca Alagoa Al√©m Para√≠ba Alfredo Vasconcelos Alto Capara√≥ Alto Jequitib√° Alto Rio Doce Amparo do Serra Andrel√¢ndia Ant√¥nio author: Edwin Foster
title: A Breakthrough in Oncology: Verastem Oncology's VS-7375 and the KRAS G12D Challenge
text:
A Breakthrough in Oncology: Verastem Oncology‚Äôs VS-7375 and the KRAS G12D Challenge
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration‚Äôs (FDA) clearance of Verastem Oncology‚Äôs Investigational New Drug (IND) application for VS-7375 marks a pivotal moment in the fight against cancers driven by the KRAS G12D mutation. This mutation, responsible for 26% of all KRAS-related cancers, has long been a therapeutic enigma‚Äîuntil now. With no FDA-approved therapies targeting this specific mutation, the greenlight for Phase 1/2a trials positions Verastem at the forefront of an underserved oncology market. Here‚Äôs why investors should pay close attention.
The KRAS G12D Challenge: A Market of Unmet Need
KRAS mutations are among the most common oncogenic drivers in solid tumors, accounting for approximately 10‚Äì30% of cases across cancers like pancreatic, colorectal, and non-small cell lung cancers (NSCLC). The G12D subtype, the most prevalent (37% in pancreatic, 12.5% in colorectal, and 5% in NSCLC), has been particularly elusive due to its structural complexity. Existing therapies, such as Amgen‚Äôs sotorasib and Mirati Therapeutics‚Äô adagrasib, target only the ‚ÄúON‚Äù state of KRAS, leaving the ‚ÄúOFF‚Äù state unaddressed. VS-7375‚Äôs dual inhibition mechanism‚Äîtargeting both states‚Äîcould offer deeper responses and fewer relapses, a critical advantage in a space where resistance remains a major hurdle.
Clinical Momentum and Strategic Advantages
Verastem‚Äôs IND clearance paves the way for a Phase 1/2a trial in the U.S., expected to begin by mid-2025. The trial will evaluate VS-7375 as monotherapy and in combination regimens, with expansion cohorts focused on pancreatic, colorectal, and NSCLC patients. This dual-pronged approach aligns with emerging evidence that combination therapies may enhance efficacy in KRAS-driven tumors.
Early data from a GenFleet Therapeutics-led Phase 1/2 trial in China, presented at the 2025 American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) meeting, offers promising signals. The trial demonstrated no dose-limiting toxicities across six dose levels and partial responses in pancreatic and lung cancer patients. These results, though preliminary, suggest a favorable safety profile and clinical activity‚Äîa stark contrast to earlier KRAS inhibitors that struggled with toxicity.
Market Potential and Financial Implications
The global KRAS inhibitor market is projected to exceed $6 billion by 2030, driven by rising cancer incidence and the need for targeted therapies. For Verastem, the KRAS G12D subset alone represents a significant opportunity. With 37% of pancreatic cancer patients carrying the mutation‚Äîa disease with a 5-year survival rate of just 12%‚ÄîVS-7375 could become a cornerstone treatment.
Investors should monitor Verastem‚Äôs stock closely. While the company‚Äôs market cap of approximately $500 million (as of May 2025) reflects its small size and development-stage pipeline, a successful Phase 1/2a trial could catalyze significant upside. A $500 million milestone payment from GenFleet for global rights to VS-7375, coupled with potential partnerships, further strengthens its financial runway.
Risks and Considerations
The path to approval is not without challenges. Competitors like Amgen and Mirati are advancing their own KRAS inhibitors, and VS-7375‚Äôs efficacy must be proven in larger trials. Additionally, regulatory scrutiny of oncology drugs is intensifying, particularly around endpoints like progression-free survival.
Conclusion: A High-Reward, High-Impact Opportunity
Verastem Oncology‚Äôs VS-7375 stands at the intersection of scientific innovation and unmet medical need. With a mutation-specific target affecting hundreds of thousands of patients annually, and early data pointing to both safety and efficacy, this drug has the potential to redefine treatment paradigms.
Key statistics underscore the opportunity:
- KRAS G12D mutations account for 26% of all KRAS-driven cancers.
- Pancreatic cancer, where 37% of cases carry the mutation, has a 5-year survival rate of 12%.
- GenFleet‚Äôs trial showed partial responses in pancreatic and NSCLC patients, with no dose-limiting toxicities.
For investors, the stock‚Äôs current valuation offers a compelling entry point if Phase 1/2a results mirror the Chinese trial‚Äôs success. While risks persist, the absence of approved therapies for this mutation and the drug‚Äôs novel mechanism make Verastem a high-impact play in oncology. The FDA‚Äôs IND clearance is not just a milestone‚Äîit‚Äôs a catalyst for a new era in precision oncology.
In the words of the company‚Äôs CEO, ‚ÄúVS-7375 could be the first therapy to address the full spectrum of KRAS G12D-driven cancers.‚Äù For investors, this is a call to action in a race where the finish line offers both scientific triumph and substantial financial reward.

author: Tanja Banner
title: Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden entt√§uscht
text:
Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden entt√§uscht
Die Suche nach einer zweiten Erde konzentrierte sich auf das Trappist-1-System. Nun zeigen neue Daten des ‚ÄûJames Webb‚Äú-Teleskops ein unerwartetes Ergebnis.
Montr√©al ‚Äì Wenn es um Planeten au√üerhalb unseres Sonnensystems geht, auf denen es m√∂glicherweise Leben geben k√∂nnte, dann f√§llt immer ein Name: ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú. Dabei handelt es sich um einen roten Zwergstern, der nur etwa 40 Lichtjahre von der Erde entfernt ist und von sieben Planeten umkreist wird, die etwa erdgro√ü sind. Mehrere dieser Planeten befinden sich in der sogenannten ‚Äûhabitablen Zone‚Äú des Sterns ‚Äì das hei√üt, auf ihnen herrschen Temperaturen, die fl√ºssiges Wasser an der Oberfl√§che m√∂glich machen.
Deshalb gilt das ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-System als die gr√∂√üte Hoffnung bei Forschenden, eine ‚Äûzweite Erde‚Äú im Universum zu finden. Seit das ‚ÄûJames Webb‚Äú-Weltraumteleskop aktiv ist, kann die Forschungsgemeinschaft die ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-Planeten genauer untersuchen und mehr √ºber sie herausfinden. Dabei steht vor allem eine Frage im Vordergrund: Haben die Planeten in der habitablen Zone Atmosph√§ren?
Suche nach einer zweiten Erde: Der Exoplanet Trappist-1 d ist es wohl nicht
‚ÄûLetztendlich m√∂chten wir wissen, ob es irgendwo anders etwas √Ñhnliches wie die Umwelt gibt, die wir auf der Erde genie√üen, und unter welchen Bedingungen dies m√∂glich ist‚Äú, sagt Caroline Piaulet-Ghorayeb (University of Chicago und Universit√© de Montr√©al in einer Nasa-Mitteilung. ‚ÄûW√§hrend das ‚ÄöJames Webb‚Äò-Weltraumteleskop der Nasa uns erstmals die M√∂glichkeit gibt, diese Frage bei erd√§hnlichen Planeten zu untersuchen, k√∂nnen wir Trappist-1 d zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt von der Liste potenzieller Erdzwillinge oder -cousins ausschlie√üen.‚Äú Die Forschungsergebnisse wurden im Fachmagazin The Astrophysical Journal ver√∂ffentlicht.
Der Planet Trappist-1 d ist aus der Sicht des Sterns der dritte Planet und befindet sich am Rand der habitablen Zone. Er ben√∂tigt nur vier Erdtage, um den Stern einmal zu umrunden. Mithilfe des NIRSpec-Instruments des Weltraumteleskops hat das Forschungsteam nach Molek√ºlen Ausschau gehalten, die in der Erdatmosph√§re vorkommen ‚Äì beispielsweise Wasser, Methan oder Kohlendioxid. Gefunden wurden jedoch keine.
‚ÄûWebb‚Äú-Teleskop entdeckt keine Atmosph√§re bei Trappist-1 d
F√ºr das Forschungsteam gibt es verschiedene Gr√ºnde, warum um Trappist-1 d keine Atmosph√§re entdeckt wurde, wie Piaulet-Ghorayeb erkl√§rt: ‚ÄûEr k√∂nnte eine extrem d√ºnne Atmosph√§re haben, die schwer zu erkennen ist, √§hnlich wie auf dem Mars. Alternativ k√∂nnte es sehr dichte Wolken in gro√üer H√∂he geben, die unsere Erkennung bestimmter atmosph√§rischer Signaturen blockieren ‚Äì eher wie auf der Venus. Oder es k√∂nnte sich um einen kargen Felsen ohne jegliche Atmosph√§re handeln.‚Äú
Allerdings befindet sich Trappist-1 d auch in einem Umfeld, das es schwer macht, eine Atmosph√§re dauerhaft zu halten: Rote Zwergsterne sind bekannt daf√ºr, dass sie sehr aktiv sind. Sie schleudern h√§ufig Materie und hochenergetische Strahlung ins Weltall, die die Atmosph√§re von kleinen Planeten wegrei√üen kann ‚Äì vor allem, wenn die Planeten sich nahe an dem Stern befinden, wie es Trappist-1 d tut. Rote Zwergsterne sind jedoch auch die am h√§ufigsten vorkommenden Sterne in unserer Galaxie, weshalb die Forschung hofft, Planeten zu finden, die im Orbit um einen roten Zwerg ihre Atmosph√§re halten k√∂nnen.
Haben die anderen Trappist-1-Planeten vielleicht Atmosph√§ren?
‚ÄûWir stehen noch ganz am Anfang, wenn es darum geht, mit ‚ÄöWebb‚Äò nach Atmosph√§ren auf erd√§hnlichen Planeten zu suchen und die Grenze zwischen Planeten, die eine Atmosph√§re halten k√∂nnen, und solchen, die dies nicht k√∂nnen, zu definieren‚Äú, betont Co-Autor Bj√∂rn Benneke. Die Beobachtung der √§u√üeren ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-Planeten mit dem ‚ÄûWebb‚Äú-Teleskop l√§uft derzeit. Wie das Ergebnis aussehen k√∂nnte, ist noch unklar. Auf der einen Seite sind die Planeten e, f, g und h weiter vom Stern entfernt ‚Äì es k√∂nnte ihnen also etwas leichter fallen, ihre potenziellen Atmosph√§ren zu halten.
Durch ihre gr√∂√üere Entfernung vom Stern sind sie jedoch auch etwas k√ºhler, was es dem Weltraumteleskop schwerer macht, atmosph√§rische Signaturen aufzusp√ºren. ‚ÄûDie Hoffnung f√ºr die Atmosph√§ren der Trappist-1-Planeten ist noch nicht verloren‚Äú, muntert Piaulet-Ghorayeb auf. ‚ÄûAuch wenn wir auf Planet d keine deutlichen atmosph√§rischen Signaturen gefunden haben, besteht dennoch die M√∂glichkeit, dass die √§u√üeren Planeten viel Wasser und andere atmosph√§rische Komponenten enthalten.‚Äú (tab)

author: Poster
title: Role of Mantras with Aut√©ntico Pandit for Griha Pravesh puja in Bangalore.
text:
Worshiping Lord Shiva, one of the particular principal deities throughout Hinduism, offers many spiritual, mental, and physical benefits to devotees. Known as the "Destroyer" in the Indio trinity, Shiva's worship embodies profound philosophical and symbolic symbolism that contribute to the well-being involving individuals and community. ### Spiritual Positive aspects **1. Liberation (Moksha): ** The supreme goal of Hindu spiritual practice is definitely liberation from the particular cycle of delivery and death (samsara). Worshiping Lord Shiva is believed to guide devotees towards moksha. Shiva, as being the destroyer of ignorance and ego, helps supporters transcend earthly parts and attain psychic enlightenment. **2. Interior Peace: ** Normal worship of Shiva brings a strong sense of inner peace and solace. Meditating on Shiva‚Äôs form, chanting the mantras, or perhaps focusing on the Shiva Lingam can quiet the mind and even reduce stress. This particular practice fosters the serene inner environment conducive to personal growth and spiritual development. **3. Connection with the Work: ** Shiva is viewed as a direct website link to the divine essence. His praise fosters a personal romantic relationship with the bright, helping devotees sense a sense involving closeness and direct communication using the larger power.
L√©gitime Pandit for Griha Pravesh puja in Bangalore brings about a new profound sense involving belonging and goal in life. ### Mental Benefits **1. Mental Clarity in addition to Focus: ** The particular practice of meditating on Shiva, especially through the repetition associated with the Mahamrityunjaya Mantra, enhances mental quality and focus. This kind of mantra, known as the "Death Conquering Rule, " is believed to purify the mind and remove unfavorable energies, promoting emotional sharpness and attention. **2. Emotional Steadiness: ** Worshiping Shiva encourages emotional stability. As the deity who embodies the two asceticism and the particular cosmic dance of creation and break down, Shiva represents the particular balance of opposites. Regular devotion in order to Shiva helps enthusiasts manage their feelings better, promoting balanced and harmonious state of mind. **3. Reduction involving Fear and Panic: ** Shiva, frequently depicted because the master of the fearsome aspects of living, helps devotees are up against and conquer their own fears. Worshiping your pet imbues individuals with courage and strength, reducing anxiety plus instilling a feeling of relaxed and resilience within facing life's challenges. ### Physical Positive aspects **1. Health insurance and Healing: ** Shiva is usually associated with healing and well-being. Typically the practice of Abhishekam (ritual bathing with the Shiva Lingam) using water, milk, sweetie, and other elements is believed to purify not merely the deity but also the particular devotee's physical entire body, promoting health and longevity. Chanting Shiva's mantras is also considered to have an optimistic impact on actual health by minimizing stress and enhancing overall well-being.
Worshiping Lord Shiva, one of the particular principal deities throughout Hinduism, offers many spiritual, mental, and physical benefits to devotees. Known as the "Destroyer" in the Indio trinity, Shiva's worship embodies profound philosophical and symbolic symbolism that contribute to the well-being involving individuals and community. ### Spiritual Positive aspects **1. Liberation (Moksha): ** The supreme goal of Hindu spiritual practice is definitely liberation from the particular cycle of delivery and death (samsara). Worshiping Lord Shiva is believed to guide devotees towards moksha. Shiva, as being the destroyer of ignorance and ego, helps supporters transcend earthly parts and attain psychic enlightenment. **2. Interior Peace: ** Normal worship of Shiva brings a strong sense of inner peace and solace. Meditating on Shiva‚Äôs form, chanting the mantras, or perhaps focusing on the Shiva Lingam can quiet the mind and even reduce stress. This particular practice fosters the serene inner environment conducive to personal growth and spiritual development. **3. Connection with the Work: ** Shiva is viewed as a direct website link to the divine essence. His praise fosters a personal romantic relationship with the bright, helping devotees sense a sense involving closeness and direct communication using the larger power.

title: Ground News - Wall Street Journal: Biden puts US troops in danger
text:
Summary by Ground News Iranian proxies have attacked U.S. forces in the Middle East about 100 times since October. title: üî¥EN VIVO | Manifestaciones en Bogot√° HOY 15 de agosto: Transmilenio y movilidad
text:
En la tarde de este jueves 15 de agosto, se presentan bloqueos de movilidad por presuntas manifestaciones de las universidades Distrital y Pedag√≥gica . En lugar se dan enfrentamientos entre encapuchados y uniformados de la UNDMO.
Aproximadamente a las cuatro de la tarde se dio a conocer, por medio de la cuenta oficial de ‚ÄòTr√°nsito Bogot√°‚Äô, que se presentaban bloqueos en la carrera 3A con Calle 26 sentido sur - norte, en inmediaciones de la Universidad Distrital , generando afectaci√≥n ambas calzada viales.
Le contamos el minuto a minuto de como se encuentra la movilidad en la ciudad y las rutas alternas que presenta Transmilenio ante esta situaci√≥n.
üî¥ EN VIVO 4:34 p. m. | Contin√∫an los enfrentamientos entre encapuchados y uniformados de la UNDMO en inmediaciones de la Universidad Distrital.
